mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_gfix_fctr.select */ SELECT gfix_div_cd /* gfix_div_cd 성장비만지수_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ ,sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,age_mcnt /* age_mcnt 나이_개월수 numeric */ ,fctr_1 /* fctr_1 팩터_1 numeric */ ,fctr_2 /* fctr_2 팩터_2 numeric */ ,fctr_3 /* fctr_3 팩터_3 numeric */ ,fctr_4 /* fctr_4 팩터_4 numeric */ ,fctr_5 /* fctr_5 팩터_5 numeric */ ,fctr_6 /* fctr_6 팩터_6 numeric */ ,fctr_7 /* fctr_7 팩터_7 numeric */ ,idx_frml_cd /* idx_frml_cd 지수_공식_코드 character varying(500) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_gfix_fctr WHERE 1 = 1 AND gfix_div_cd = #{gfixDivCd} /* gfix_div_cd 성장비만지수_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ AND sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ AND age_mcnt = #{ageMcnt} /* age_mcnt 나이_개월수 numeric */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_gfix_fctr.insert */ INSERT INTO ti_gfix_fctr ( gfix_div_cd /* gfix_div_cd 성장비만지수_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ ,sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,age_mcnt /* age_mcnt 나이_개월수 numeric */
,fctr_1 /* fctr_1 팩터_1 numeric */
,fctr_2 /* fctr_2 팩터_2 numeric */
,fctr_3 /* fctr_3 팩터_3 numeric */
,fctr_4 /* fctr_4 팩터_4 numeric */
,fctr_5 /* fctr_5 팩터_5 numeric */

,fctr_7 /* fctr_7 팩터_7 numeric */

,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{gfixDivCd} /* gfix_div_cd 성장비만지수_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ #{ageMcnt} /* age_mcnt 나이_개월수 numeric */
,#{fctr1} /* fctr_1 팩터_1 numeric */
,#{fctr2} /* fctr_2 팩터_2 numeric */
,#{fctr3} /* fctr_3 팩터_3 numeric */
,#{fctr4} /* fctr_4 팩터_4 numeric */
,#{fctr5} /* fctr_5 팩터_5 numeric */
,#{fctr6} /* fctr_6 팩터_6 numeric */
,#{fctr7} /* fctr_7 팩터_7 numeric */
,#{idxFrmlCd} /* idx_frml_cd 지수_공식_코드 character varying(500) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
